title: Not Signed In
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is not signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to select an event
custom_expected: THEN the user will be prompted to log in

title: Sign In
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is not signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks an event OR chooses to click Sign In or Register from the settings overlay
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see an overlay prompting them to Sign in
AND users should be able to sign in with valid credentials
(Ex: functionalTest5@mlbam.com / functionalTest5)

title: Register
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not signed in
AND the user has brought up the Sign In/Register overlay
custom_steps: When the user clicks Choose Package
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to mlb.mlb.com/mlb/subscriptions/index.js&affiliateId=MLBTVREDIRECT
AND the user will be presented the available packages for streaming service to MLB.TV

title: Entitlement - Free (No Entitlement)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has an account that is not entitled
custom_steps: WHEN the user signs in
custom_expected:
THEN the user should only have access to Free Game of the Day and MLB Plus Game of the Day content minus any blackout restrictions
AND the user will receive an upsell for all other content on the site

title: Entitlement - Premium
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a Premium account
custom_steps: WHEN the user signs in with their credentials
custom_expected:
THEN the user should have full access to all regular season content minus blackout restrictions for Live/Archive
- Excludes some Postseason, ASG and other coverage if applicable

title: Entitlement - FYT
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a FYT entitlement (this is complicated so bear in mind the scenario below)
FYT = Premium + a FYT entitlement and an RSN validation

Example
1. Red Sox fan in NY (ie red sox is the away team)
2. Red Sox visit to play against NYM or NYY
3. User has premium already
4. User has paid for FYT ($10 one team only per account)
5. User has a cable subscription in the NY area
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a local game while their followed team is listed
- Red Sox @ NYY and FYT Red Sox
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be granted access to the FYT team's feeds ONLY
- Red Sox (Away Audio/Video) feeds

And the user will be told to watch the game on their participating team's feed if they choose the Home team

title: Entitlement - Single Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a Single Team entitlement
Ex: mets_ent@mlbam.com / bas3ba11

ALL 30 teams have this (yankees_ent@mlbam.com)
All 30 teams have this in QA (yankees_qa_ent@mlbam.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be granted access only to games where their team is playing
AND the user will be connected to their team's content only
AND the user will get Upsell for all other content

title: Live - Free Game of the Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is trying to load a Live "Free Game of the Day" event
Ex: Any game from 10/2/2016 (that whole day is FGOD)

AND the user is signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks an event
custom_expected: THEN the user will have full access to the content for the FGOD event

title: Live - MLB Plus Game of the Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is trying to play a Live "MLB Plus Game of the Day" event
- Ex: 7/1 CHI@NYM

AND the user is signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user plays the event
custom_expected: THEN the user will be granted access to the event

title: Live - Paid Event
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is trying to load a Live "Paid" event
AND the user is entitled
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the event
custom_expected: THEN the user should be granted access and media should play without issue

title: Archive - Free Game of the Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is trying to load an Archived "Free Game of the Day" event
Ex: Any game from 10/2/2016 (that whole day is FGOD)

AND the user is signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks an event
custom_expected: THEN the user will have full access to the content for the FGOD event

title: Archive - MLB Plus Game of the Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is trying to play an Archived "MLB Plus Game of the Day" event
- Ex: 7/1 CHI@NYM

AND the user is signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user plays the event
custom_expected: THEN the user will be granted access to the event

title: Archive - Paid Event
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is trying to load an Archived "Paid" event
AND the user is entitled
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the event
custom_expected: THEN the user should be granted access and media should play without issue

title: Timeline Scrubber Progresses Automatically
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded media
custom_steps: WHEN the feed continues playing
custom_expected: THEN the scrubber should continue to progress through the game

title: Timeline Scrubber Manual Adjustment
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded media
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to interact with the scrubber bar
custom_expected:
THEN the game should scrub to the appropriate spot within the game feed
AND any stats on the page should update appropriately

title: Timeline Timestamp Displays
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded media
custom_steps: WHEN the game progresses
custom_expected: THEN the timestamp next to the Total Time (all the way to the right of the scrubber) should update appropriately on a 1s basis

title: Timeline - RHE
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded an event with data available
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the RHE button (to the right of forward 10s)
custom_expected:
THEN the scrubber should turn into an Inning/RHE timeline
AND the user should be able to click from the Top or Bottom of each inning to scrub through the game accordingly

title: Live
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing a Live event
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Live button
custom_expected: THEN the user should be brought directly to the Live-most point in the event's broadcast

title: Rewind 10s
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded media
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Rewind 10s button
custom_expected: THEN the feed should jump back 10s appropriately

title: Forward 10s
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded media
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Forward 10s button
custom_expected: THEN the feed should jump forward 10s appropriately

title: Play/Pause
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing media on the app
custom_steps: WHEN the asset begins playing
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see a pause icon on the far-left
AND clicking it will pause the video/switch it to the Play icon
AND clicking it again will play media/switch it to the Pause icon

title: Controls Hide after 10s
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing media
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on the player to display controls
AND the user remains idle going forward
custom_expected: THEN the player controls should automatically hide after ~10 seconds

title: Additional Controls Overlay
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded a feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Additional Controls section from the right side of the scrubber bar
custom_expected:
THEN an overlay should come up with
- Closed Captioning
- Broadcast Options
- Volume Scrubber

title: Broadcast Options Shown/Hidden
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is playing media
AND the user has clicked on the screen to display player controls
AND the user has clicked the Additional Controls filter from the right-end side of the scrubber bar
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Broadcast Options
custom_expected: THEN the user will be able to select from various Video and Audio-Only broadcasts

title: Selecting a Broadcast
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has brought up the Broadcast Options
AND the user has appropriate entitlements/access to the media
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a broadcast from the Broadcast Options overlay
custom_expected:
THEN the user should get playback of the corresponding broadcast
AND the user should be able to select alternate audio where available too

title: Closed Captioning
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened the Additional controls button (to the right of the scrubber)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Closed Captioning
custom_expected:
THEN the button will be white = enabled and black = disabled 
AND Captions should display for the video if white

title: Volume Up/Down
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened Additional Controls
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the volume bar
custom_expected: THEN the volume should adjust accordingly (note the user can't mute by clicking the volume icon. This is expected)

title: Show Settings
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is within the App (does not need to be media playback related)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user swipes LEFT from the right side of the screen
AND the user clicks Settings
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be presented the following options
- My Account (Signed In) [OR] Sign In or Register (Anonymous)
- Preferences
- Privacy Policy
- Terms & Conditions
- Permissions
- Rate and review
- Privacy policy

title: Signed In - My Account
custom_preconds: Given the user is signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects My Account from the Settings overlay
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the following
"You are signed in as"
[email address]

AND clicking Sign Out will sign the user out and bring them to the homescreen of the app
AND the My Account section should still be visible on the right side of the page

title: Signed Out - Sign In or Register
custom_preconds: Given the user is signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Sign In or Register" from the settings overlay
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be presented with the login page
AND the user will be prompted to either Sign in or create a new account

title: Preferences
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has the Settings section open
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Preferences
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be presented the following options
- Hide / Show Scores
- Closed Captioning
- Warn about metered connection
- Favorite Teams

title: Hide Scores
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded the Preferences panel
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Hide / Show Scores
custom_expected:
THEN the button should toggle visibility 
- Scores
- Wins/Loss/Saves
- Inning

- This will also put dashes in the RHE section of the player controls
- This will also hide data on the Scoreboard overlay

title: Show Scores
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded the Preferences panel
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Hide / Show Scores
custom_expected:
THEN the button should toggle visibility 
- Scores
- Wins/Loss/Saves
- Inning

- This will also remove dashes in the RHE section of the player controls
- This will also show data on the Scoreboard overlay

title: CC Show/Hide
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has the Preferences Panel open
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Closed Captioning from the options
custom_expected: THEN this should toggle Captions on and off accordingly

title: Metered Connection Show/Hide
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened the Preferences Panel
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Warn about metered connection"
custom_expected:
THEN the interaction should toggle the value to either Yes/No depending on previous state
AND this feature will warn users when the network connection becomes poor

title: Favorites Added
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has the Preferences Panel Open
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Favorite Teams >"
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a list of all teams by
- American League
- National League

AND checking the box next to a team will add it to your favorites list
AND this will put a Star in the top-left of each chip associated with your favorite team

title: Favorites Removed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the preferences panel open
AND the user has a team favorited already
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks an X next to the team in their favorites list
custom_expected:
THEN the listing should be removed from the user's Favorite Teams
*Note* The same behavior should occur unchecking a check box from the Set Favorites Team scenario
